title: Cursive script
content:
Looked like an easy one at first sight, but myfonts doesn't return anything close when i look for cursive script..  
Anyone? :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804120116im_/http:/typophile.com/files/168377af9a8e40a279360c73ec12aa51_6214.jpg)
author: mike.j

comments.content:
Hand-drawn as stated on [Will Miller's website](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804120116/http:/www.leftraggedright.com/94412/794292/projects/logos-marks), author of this logo:

> [...] logos and marks that were sketched, refined, developed and produced [...]

Some alternatives: [Matinee Idol](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804120116/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/matinee-idol), [So Prolix](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804120116/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/so-prolix), [Brasserie](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804120116/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wilton/brasserie), [Learning Curve](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804120116/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Learning-Curve-Pro), [League Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804120116/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/league-script-1), [Inessa](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804120116/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/maccampus/inessa), [Send Flowers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804120116/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesetit/send-flowers), [Handsome](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804120116/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/handsome-pro), " [Casual Monolinear Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804120116/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/casual_monolinear_script/)" list at Fontshop, [Mocha Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804120116/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/charlesborges/mocha-script), [Prelude](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804120116/http:/www.dafont.com/preludeflf.font), [Kidorama](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804120116/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nowak/kidorama)
